OOC: Okay, so what I understand is Shad was a part of the Maximals, 
died heroically, then was `reborn' at the time of now... I think. If 
I'm wrong, ignore this post then lol. But well... I feel like I better 
start posting something... Erk! I can't remember where Cheetor was 
during this battle >_< Plus I got a madeup, should I post the bio here 
too?

~Past~
Cheetor snapped his head up at the sound of familar weaponry, eyes 
scanning for the source, already knowing who it was.  `Not again,' was 
all he could think. The side of good was to win, no one was supposed to 
die. So many had already passed on to the Matrix. He growled to 
himself, he should be out there helping, not stuck inside this ancient 
ship that was their way home. His hands tightened, the metal creaking 
under his restraint. 

He let out a yell of rage, slamming his hand down on the controls just 
as Rhinox beside him spoke of Shadimus. "Rest in peace," he whispered.

~Present~
The feline robot stretched almost lazily in his room, taking a well; in 
his opinion, deserved catnap. Just as he was drifting off, his ear 
twitched at the sound of yelling and rolled over, his paws coming up to 
clamp over his ears. That didn't help as it only trapped the sound and 
he groaned before finally rolling off his bed and growling slightly to 
himself. 

"Can't a bot get some sleep around here?" He streched again, before 
padding out of his room in beast mode. 

OOC: Would Cheetor still be his Transmetal 2 self, or Trans Organic?

OMWOS
